days.summary: God creates the world, reveals His glory in creation, and Jesus begins His public ministry.
days.keyVerseText: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament shows His handiwork.

days.summary: Sin enters the world, yet God hints at a Redeemer; Jesus forgives, heals, and calls sinners.
days.keyVerseText: And I will put enmity between you and the woman, and between your seed and her Seed; He shall bruise your head, and you shall bruise His heel.
